mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_REPLY ( COMM_RE_NO, COMM_RE_CONT, COMM_RE_DATE, MEMBER_ID, COMM_NO ) VALUES ( COMMUNITY_REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{commReCont}, SYSDATE, #{memberId}, #{commNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT COMM_RE_NO, COMM_RE_CONT, COMM_RE_DATE, MEMBER_ID, COMM_NO FROM COMMUNITY_REPLY WHERE COMM_NO=#{commNo} ORDER BY COMM_RE_NO ASC
